Package com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.query.restriction.spi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DpsRestriction
    DPS Internal contract for Restriction.
    ObjectFieldRestriction
    A restriction that applies to an object field as opposed to a modelled field.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeInModelRestriction
    Restriction to filter instances of specific versions (model version) only, where the given attribute name is defined.
    AttributePathRestriction
    A restriction to compare modeled attributes against path values.
    AttributeRestriction
    Simple restriction involving attribute values.
    BetweenRestriction
    Class to resolve between and not between restrictions.
    CdtMemberSimpleRestriction
    Creates a simple restriction (e.g.
    CdtPathValueRestriction
    A restriction to compare CDT member/attribute against another CDT member/attribute in the path.
    ContainmentRestriction
    Creates a containment restriction applicable for change logs (e.g.
    DescendantsRestriction
    Class to resolve descendants and not descendants restrictions.
    HasMemberRestriction
    Creates a HasMember restriction applicable for group entities (e.g.
    InRestriction
    Class that creates an IN restriction type, restricting an attribute to a list of values.
    InternalRestriction
    Creates an internal restriction applicable for group entities.
    ListCdtMemberRestriction
    Creates a restriction to match a value of a CDT attribute inside a list.
    ListMemberRestriction
    A restriction which verifies if a list attribute has members matching specific restrictions.
    ListRestriction
    Common functionality of a List restriction.
    LogicalRestriction
    Implement logical restriction (AND/OR) and the negation of this logical restriction.
    NullValueRestriction
    Implementation of the null value restriction and not null value restriction.
    ObjectFieldBetweenRestriction
    Class to resolve between and not between restrictions for ObjectFields.
    ObjectFieldInRestriction
    Class that creates an IN Restriction type, restricting a Object Field to a list of values.
    ObjectFieldPartialMatchRestriction
    Implementation of the partial match restriction and not match restriction.
    ObjectFieldPathRestriction
    A restriction to compare object fields against path values.
    ObjectFieldRetriever
    Some object field restrictions serialized as part of a saved query by earlier versions of the relevant restriction class may be missing the object field when deserialized.
    ObjectFieldSimpleRestriction
    Creates a simple restriction (e.g.
    PartialMatchRestriction
    Implementation of the partial match restriction and not match restriction.
    PathRestriction
    Base class for path restrictions.
    RedundantRestriction
    Abstract class to add property to check for redundant restriction in query.
    SimpleRestriction
    Creates a simple restriction (e.g.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LogicalOperatorEnum
    Enum defining the supported logical operators in restrictions.
    RestrictionType
    Indicates the type of restriction.
    SimpleExpressionOperator
    Enum containing the supported operators for simple expression restrictions.
